forum.name: updates
forum.description: find out what's new with anylad. feature announcements and bug fix info. thanks all!
forum.latestCommentText: im gonna miss it for sure

thread.title: Video Player audio fix & more

comments.text: Hi all! Here's what's new in today's v147.1 (you're on [version])! Hope you enjoy!
You can now use the command "show inventory" to open the inventory! Thx Gio!
We fixed an issue with videos playing audio double, resulting in a metallic, echoing, broken sound! Thx Jinx, Delco & Ferny!
There's new Area setting "Only editors use inventory"! With this mode, opening the inventory (as non-editor) shows a message that this is currently disallowed in the area.

thread.latestCommentText: There's new Area setting "Only editors use inventory"! With this mode, opening the inventory (as non-editor) shows a message that this is currently disallowed in the area.
